subject: Fix error when downloading image status is not active

values.-1: This patch needs further work before it can be merged
values.+1: Looks good to me, but someone else must approve

messages.message:
Patch Set 1: Code-Review-1

We need to target the bug to Liberty.

Another thing is that this change has side effect not mentioned in the commit message nor anywhere in the bug. It does allow download of deactivated image for admin user through v2.

This was bug in our implementation (and still is on v1) as the deactivation spec specifies that admin should be able to download the deactivated image.

I'm not willing to take this backport as it is with such undocumented side effect.

Patch Set 1:

Anyways, thanks Dirk for showing the initiative to get this backported. Appreciate that!

Patch Set 1: Verified+1

Build succeeded (check pipeline).

Patch Set 1:

Erno, I don't seem to have privileges to retarget this bugreport also against liberty. can you do that please?

This is not an undocumented side effect, it is the main fix imho of this patch: to ensure that the image can be downloaded by admin, which is needed for e.g. live migration to work.

Patch Set 1:

I've targeted the bug for Liberty.

I think it'd be enough to explicitly mention this in the bug. Other than, I'm ok with this backport.

Patch Set 1:

Folks, please take in mind that we have revert for this fix:
https://review.openstack.org/#/c/254334/ (unfortunately I didn't have time to dig into this).

Patch Set 1:

Please note that this suggested revert was -2'ed.
Uploaded patch set 2: Patch Set 1 was rebased.

Patch Set 2: Code-Review-1

https://bugs.launchpad.net/glance/+bug/1472449 shows this as fixed already. This should probably be abandoned at this point.

Patch Set 2:

Looking at https://bugs.launchpad.net/glance/+bug/1472449/+activity
seems like glance/liberty: status New -> Fix Committed is a bug in OpenStack Infra script, it was supposed set glanceclient task status.

Is the https://git.openstack.org/cgit/openstack/python-glanceclient/commit/?id=c077858dd6e0cd827af2418e1a05ca1f27937764 enough to fix this for Liberty?

Patch Set 2:

Alan, should we really be backporting a change that was reverted though?
